title: Listen to our podcast episode about the latest Gemini app updates.
description: There are tons of new features to check out in the Gemini app, from personalization to real-time collaboration. In the latest episode of the Google AI: Release Notes podâ€¦
excerpt: There are tons of new features to check out in the Gemini app, from personalization to real-time collaboration. In the latest episode of the Google AI: Release Notes podcast, host Logan Kilpatrick goes on a deep dive with Dave Citron, senior director of product management for the Gemini app.Hear the full conversation below, or listen to the Google AI: Release Notes podcast on Apple Podcasts or Spotify.
text: There are tons of new features to check out in the Gemini app, from personalization to real-time collaboration. In the latest episode of the Google AI: Release Notes podcast, host Logan Kilpatrick goes on a deep dive with Dave Citron, senior director of product management for the Gemini app.Hear the full conversation below, or listen to the Google AI: Release Notes podcast on Apple Podcasts or Spotify.
html:
There are tons of new features to check out in the Gemini app, from personalization to real-time collaboration. In the latest episode of the Google AI: Release Notes podcast, host Logan Kilpatrick goes on a deep dive with Dave Citron, senior director of product management for the Gemini app.

Hear the full conversation below, or listen to the Google AI: Release Notes podcast on Apple Podcasts or Spotify.
